## Ingredients

| Amount | Ingredient               |
|--------|--------------------------|
| 18--24 | Littleneck Clams         |
| ¼ lbs  | butter                   |
| 3 T    | Shallot (finely chopped) |
| 1 t    | Minced garlic            |
| ¼ C    | Fresh parsley            |
| 1 T    | Fresh basil              |
| 1 C    | Bread crumbs             |
| 8 T    | Grated parmesan          |
| 2 T    | Dry white wine           |
| ¼ C    | Chopped prosciutto       |
| ¼ t    | Red pepper flakes        |
| taste  | salt and pepper          |
| 2 T    | Olive oil                |

## Directions

1.  Preheat oven to 425 F
2.  Shuck clams
3.  Process clams in food processor (but do not over process)
4.  In saucepan, combine clams with butter, shallots, garlic, parsley, basil, breadcrumbs, 6 T cheese, wine, prosciutto, pepper flakes, salt and pepper
5.  Cook until well blended
6.  Stuff shells
7.  Sprinkle with cheese and olive oil
8.  Bake 15 minutes
9.  Broil for final minute
